description: Metro2 Credit Report for an account for a given billing cycle

account_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the account

credit_report_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the statement

activity_date.description: Signifies date of most recent update to accounts. If accounts are updated on different dates, use most recent. A future date should not be reported.

date_created.description: Contains the date the media was generated. A future date should not be reported.

program_date.description: Contains the date your reporting format was developed.

program_revision_date.description: Contains the last date your reporting format was revised.

reporter_name.description: Contains the name of the processing company sending the data; i.e., data furnisher or processor.

reporter_address.description: Contains the complete mailing address of the processing company; i.e., street address, city, state and zip code.
reporter_address.example: 350 5th Ave, New York, NY 10118, United States

reporter_telephone_number.description: Contains the telephone number (Area Code + number) of the company sending the data; i.e., data furnisher or processor.

consumer_account_number.description: The account_id for the individual reported. This is the canonical Canopy account id.

portfolio_type.description: Contains the one-character abbreviation for type of portfolio

account_type.description: Report the specific code that identifies the account classification.

date_opened.description: Report the date the account was originally opened. Retain the original Date Opened regardless of future activity, such as transfer, refinance, lost or stolen card, etc.

credit_limit.description: Total amount (in truncated dollars) that the account can borrow.

highest_credit.description: If a revolving account, highest credit is the peak balance within the statement cycle. If an installment account, it is the original loan amount.

terms_duration.description: Contains the duration of credit extended, or LOC if revolving account

terms_frequency.description: Report the frequency for payments due.

scheduled_monthly_payment_amount.description: Report the dollar amount of the scheduled monthly payment due for this reporting period, whether principal, interest only or a combination of the two.

actual_payment_amount.description: Report the dollar amount of the monthly payment actually received for this reporting period in whole dollars only.

account_status.description: Contains the status code that properly identifies the current condition of the account as of the Date of Account Information.

payment_rating.description: The Payment Rating contains a code that properly identifies whether the account was current, past due, in collections or charged off prior to the status and within the current monthâ€™s reporting period.

payment_history_profile.description: Contains up to 24 months of consecutive payment activity for the previous 24 reporting periods prior to the Date of Account Information being reported.

special_comment_code.description: Used in conjunction with Account Status and Payment Rating to further define the account (e.g., closed accounts or adjustments pending).

compliance_condition_code.description: Allows the reporting of a condition that is required for legal compliance.

current_balance.description: Report the outstanding current dollar balance on the account as of the Date of Account Information.

amount_past_due.description: Report the total amount of payments that are 30 days or more past due in whole dollars only.

original_charge_off_amount.description: For Status Codes 64 and 97 (all portfolio types), report the original amount charged to loss, regardless of the declining balance. Whole dollars

first_delinquency_date.description: Indicates the first date of delinquency in a given cycle.

date_closed.description: For all portfolio types, contains the date the account was closed to further purchases, paid in full, transferred or sold.

last_payment_date.description: Report the date the most recent payment was received, whether full or partial payment is made.

name_first.description: Customer's first name. Primary account holder or controlling officer name for Business customers.

name_middle.description: Customer's middle name. Primary account holder or controlling officer name for Business customers.

name_last.description: Customer's last name. Primary account holder or controlling officer name for Business customers.

ssn.description: Social security number of the customer

date_of_birth.description: Customer's date of birth in ISO 8601 format

ecoa_code.description: Defines the relationship of the primary consumer to the account and designates the account as joint, individual, etc., in compliance with the Equal Credit Opportunity Act.

consumer_indicator_code.description: Contains a value that indicates a special condition of the account that applies to the associated consumer.

phone_number.description: Customer's phone number in E.164 format

address_zip.description: Five digit zipcode or nine digit 'ZIP+4'
